com.orientechnologies.orient.core.hook

Interface ORecordHook.Scoped

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ORecordHook
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassIndexManagerRemote, OClassIndexManager, OClassTrigger, OCommandCacheHook, OFunctionTrigger, OLiveQueryHook, ORestrictedAccessHook, OSchedulerTrigger, OSecurityTrackerHook, OSequenceTrigger, OUserTrigger
    Enclosing interface:
    ORecordHook

    public static interface ORecordHook.Scoped
extends ORecordHook
    Defines the contract of scoped hooks, extends the ORecordHook with scopes support.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.orientechnologies.orient.core.hook.ORecordHook

      Returns the array of scopes this hook interested in.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.orientechnologies.orient.core.hook.ORecordHook

    • Method Detail

      • getScopes

        ORecordHook.SCOPE[] getScopes()

        Returns the array of scopes this hook interested in. By default, all available scopes are returned, implement/override this method to limit the scopes this hook may participate to lower the number of useless invocations of this hook.

        Limiting the hook to proper scopes may give huge performance boost, especially if the hook ORecordHook.onTrigger(TYPE, ORecord) dispatcher implementation is heavy. In extreme cases, you may override the ORecordHook.onTrigger(TYPE, ORecord) to act directly on event ORecordHook.TYPE and exit early, scopes are just a more handy alternative to this.

        Returns:
        the scopes of this hook.
        See Also:
        ORecordHook.SCOPE
